{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Falckeisische Bibel</TITLE>
    <DESCRIPTION>noch gantz neu in <FORMAT>Schweins-leder</FORMAT> gebunden, √†</DESCRIPTION>
    <PRICE>12. Gulden</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <DESCRIPTION>, oder gegen einem neuen</DESCRIPTION>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Corpore Juris</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Leipziger Edition</PLACE>
  </BIBL>
  <DESCRIPTION>, zu vertauschen.</DESCRIPTION>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":4,"explanation":"Added XML declaration, corrected the tag name from PRIZE to PRICE, added DESCRIPTION tags for text outside BIBL tags, and properly nested all tags."}

parsed.fixed_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Falckeisische Bibel</TITLE>
    <DESCRIPTION>noch gantz neu in <FORMAT>Schweins-leder</FORMAT> gebunden, √†</DESCRIPTION>
    <PRICE>12. Gulden</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <DESCRIPTION>, oder gegen einem neuen</DESCRIPTION>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Corpore Juris</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Leipziger Edition</PLACE>
  </BIBL>
  <DESCRIPTION>, zu vertauschen.</DESCRIPTION>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation: Added XML declaration, corrected the tag name from PRIZE to PRICE, added DESCRIPTION tags for text outside BIBL tags, and properly nested all tags.
